TF_VAR_client.comment: client billing code, needed for 18f-ent account

TF_VAR_key_name.comment: ssh key used (actually overridden in the AMI)

TF_VAR_app_sg_ssh_cidr_blocks.comment: whitelist of CIDR blocks for ssh access to app host

TF_VAR_chef_id_key_path.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_chef_url.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_chef_id.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_live_certs.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_chef_databag_key_path.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_chef_info.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_git_deploy_key_path.comment: is not used by jenkins, so can ignore here

TF_VAR_route53_id.comment: route53 ID for login.gov root zone
TF_VAR_route53_id.value: `aws route53 list-hosted-zones-by-name --output json | jq -r '.HostedZones[] | select(.Name == "login.gov.") | .Id' | sed 's/.hostedzone.//'`

TF_VAR_power_users.comment: users who can manage the KMS keys
TF_VAR_power_users.value: `aws iam get-group --group-name identity-power --output json | ruby -e 'require "json"; require "pp"; result = []; JSON.parse(STDIN.read)["Users"].each do |u|; result << u["Arn"]; end; PP.singleline_pp result' | tr -d ' '`
